ygData.subject: Re: Denied Access?
ygData.msgSnippet: Avron, I may have mistaken the EverQuest group for another one, maybe the EQ group?  Anyway, I continue to get mail, so I guess I won t worry about it. Fred
ygData.messageBody:
Avron, I may have mistaken the EverQuest group for another one, maybe the
EQ group? Anyway, I continue to get mail, so I guess I won't worry about
it.

Fred (aka Ramalama - Wood Elf Ranger on Mathanial Marr)


Avron Vallengard <avron@...> on 04/14/99 08:48:53 AM

Please respond to EverQuest@onelist.com

To:

From: Avron Vallengard <avron@...>


>As far as I know you can't be denied to this mailing group, when I
>advertised the list I even turned off the moderated flag, which means I
>don't even need to approve/deny subscribers now, everyone is invited,
<though I CAN boot offensive people.. :)

<- Avron Vallengard -
